about_the_game:
QT OST is finally here!!!
Now you can relax on the go · ◡ ·

All of the music in this album is by bb tombo and Zack Alkek so please go check them out!!!!

bb tombo (@bbtombo) - MUSEUM and KOUEN
Zack Alkek (@hey_zack_) - QT

name: QT Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 55 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 800 MB available space

short_description: The QT Original Sound Track · ◡ · Now you can listen to the relaxing tunes wherever you are · ◡ ·
